item.title: Crab tree mess with crab apples all over pavement o/s 56 Lyndhurst road has not been fixed. still in a mess all over pavement and grass verge., 3rd October
item.description:
Please can someone sort out the crab tree o/s 56 Lyndhurst road. Mess on pavement . Grass cutting was left messy and man with blower continued to blow apples , grass all over the place and left mess. made it worse not done properly. Crab tree needs to be crowned on the top and sorted as very messy and dangerous on the pavement for people trying to walk by without slipping. Problem occurs every year. Needs sorting out please.....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyndhurst Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This food shop closed months ago & this was left behind outside on the pavement., 3rd October
item.description:
It's filthy & a deteriorating home for encouraging rats. People are starting to leave rubbish here too! The street sweepers try hard to keep the pavements clean in Herbert Road, but are fighting a losing battle when bags of rubbish are left here & next to the bins on the on the other side of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9-15, Herbert Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People filled out green waste bin with domestic waste, 3rd October
item.description:
Outside 58a people have been dumping residential waste (rugs, carpets, shower curtains) in our green wheelie bin. We have reported to our landlord but nothing can be done. Suspicion is that people moving out of next door flat have used our bin to dispose of their waste without going to the tip. We now have no ability/room to get rid of our actual domestic waste

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 146, Lyndhurst Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet
